TopicTitle: Is Laythe Aerobraking Possible without a heatshield?

Articles.Content: My ship keeps blowing up even at a thousand meters below the atmosphere. This might have been because I was entering with a speed greater than Jool orbit, but now I am more stable as I am orbiting Jool and I have a slightly inclined orbit. Is it possible to not use a heat shield in Laythe aerobraking, or do I have to use a couple thousand delta-v to orbit it again?

You can lower the heating for the game.

In my experience Laythe gets hot real easy.
unless you burn a lot of fuel to slow down you will probably burn up without a shield.
